biotools.summary: The tool allows users to simulate hybrids from crossing two parental genomes, and run the MSG (Multiplexed Shotgun Genotyping) pipeline on these simulated hybrids to test the accuracy of the algorithm. It allows researchers to decide on various parameters before they conduct an MSG experiment.

bioschemas.name: simMSG
